title: Imran Khanâ€™s Supporters Clash With Police in Pakistan After Gunman Attack
description: The former prime minister accused military and government officials of plotting the attack that wounded him as political violence welled up around Pakistan.
dc:creator: Salman Masood
media:description: Police officers detain a man during a protest to condemn the shooting of Pakistan's former prime minister, Imran Khan, in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, on Friday.
